summary.title: Threat Model Diagram
summary.description: Actor: User Browser; Processes: Login Page, Web Application, Open Source Auth Component; Data Store: Database. Trust boundaries separate the Internet, Application/Backend, and Database. Flows cover login, credential check, MotD retrieval/display, and comment submission/ack.

diagrams.title: initial diagram
diagrams.description: This diagram shows the data flow for the sample web application including login, open source authentication, message-of-the-day retrieval, and comments.
